Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
This class contains main player info and methods which manipulate points and shelf.
Author:
Marco Galli, Luca Guffanti, Daniele Ferrario

    • addCardsToShelf

      public boolean addCardsToShelf(List<ObjectCard> cards, int column)
      This method adds cards which a player picks on his turn to the player's shelf.
      Parameters:
      cards - the cards you pick in your turn
      column - column where a player wants to insert his object cards into the shelf
      Returns:
      whether a card has been successfully added
